    • Constructor Detail

      • SendMessageOperation

        public SendMessageOperation(com.google.gson.Gson gson,
                            MessagePayload message,
                            AccountObjectId payer,
                            Fee fee)

        Send message operation.

        Parameters:
        gson - GSON object to serialize message payload, BaseCoreApi.getGson or DCoreClient.Companion.getGsonBuilder can be used
        message - message payload
        payer - account id to pay for the operation
        fee - class Fee fee for the operation, by default the fee will be computed in DCT asset. When set to other then DCT, the request might fail if the asset is not convertible to DCT or conversion pool is not large enough

      • SendMessageOperation

        public SendMessageOperation(com.google.gson.Gson gson,
                            MessagePayload message,
                            AccountObjectId payer)

        Send message operation.

        Parameters:
        gson - GSON object to serialize message payload, BaseCoreApi.getGson or DCoreClient.Companion.getGsonBuilder can be used
        message - message payload
        payer - account id to pay for the operation
